tasks.text: Orchestrated a comprehensive modernization initiative for 200 computers and 4 printers spanning 4 campus computer labs, optimizing tech infrastructure to foster a cutting-edge and efficient learning environment

Leveraged ServiceNow to assess and resolve up to 10 technical issues per day as reported by students and staff, streamlining the troubleshooting process and ensuring swift resolution for optimal user experience
Collaborated with founders and developers to modernize crucial mobile infrastructure, enhancing ad performance and maintaining compliance with Google Play standards
Improved website functionality by implementing new features, optimizing user experience and troubleshooting issues, leading to increased user engagement and satisfaction
Refactored server-side code on AWS infrastructure

Boosted market presence by developing a customer-facing system leveraging proprietary biometric technology. The app consisted of a React frontend connected to an Express server handling requests to 2 REST APIs, supporting up to 1000 requests per user per day
Streamlined day-to-day office tasks by automating HR responsibilites using Javascript and Google Cloud, reducing manual data entry by 50% and saving 10+ hours per week
